title: Foxconn’s Big iPhone Plant Hit by China’s Latest Covid Lockdown
description: An outbreak in Zhengzhou has sent an unknown number of workers at the city’s Foxconn plant into quarantine. It’s a bad time of year for output of iPhones to slow down.
dc:creator: Chang Che and Amy Chang Chien
media:credit: Gilles Sabrie for The New York Times
media:description: Workers walking out for a lunch break outside the Foxconn plant in Zhengzhou, China, in 2015.
